1.title: The River That Heals
1.plot: DOWN THE MIGHTY RIVER is a 600 kilometer expedition down sub arctic Rupert's River on the last summer before its destruction by the largest hydro project in the western hemisphere.

2.title: Dams Divide More Than Just Water
2.plot: DOWN THE MIGHTY RIVER is a 600 kilometer expedition down sub arctic Rupert's River on the last summer before its destruction by the largest hydro project in the western hemisphere.

3.title: Displacement and Resilience
3.plot: DOWN THE MIGHTY RIVER is a 600 kilometer expedition down sub arctic Rupert's River on the last summer before its destruction by the largest hydro project in the western hemisphere.

4.title: Hooked on Hydro
4.plot: DOWN THE MIGHTY RIVER is a 600 kilometer expedition down sub arctic Rupert's River on the last summer before its destruction by the largest hydro project in the western hemisphere.

5.title: A World Without Rivers
5.plot: DOWN THE MIGHTY RIVER is a 600 kilometer expedition down sub arctic Rupert's River on the last summer before its destruction by the largest hydro project in the western hemisphere.

6.title: Doors Close on the Rupert
6.plot: DOWN THE MIGHTY RIVER is a 600 kilometer expedition down sub arctic Rupert's River on the last summer before its destruction by the largest hydro project in the western hemisphere.

imdb.plot outline: Down the Mighty River is a six-part documentary series about the Rupert River, one of the most magnificent wild rivers in the world, just before its destruction for a hydro-electric project in the summer of 2009. Down the Mighty River is an intimate and moving portrait of the river's story - its people, land, and wildlife - and the cultural and environmental impacts of one of the most environmentally destructive mega projects in the western hemisphere.
imdb.title: Down the Mighty River
plot: _Down the Mighty River_ (qv) is a six-part documentary series about the Rupert River, one of the most magnificent wild rivers in the world, just before its destruction for a hydro-electric project in the summer of 2009. _Down the Mighty River_ (qv) is an intimate and moving portrait of the river's story - its people, land, and wildlife - and the cultural and environmental impacts of one of the most environmentally destructive mega projects in the western hemisphere.::Rezolution Pictures
